plot: An everyday American family discovers that they have a zombie infestation. Instead of trying to rid the creatures themselves, they call on Jackie Mannex and Zom B Gon to do the job right.
title: Zom B Gon
plot_es: An everyday American family discovers that they have a zombie infestation. Instead of trying to rid the creatures themselves, they call on Jackie Mannex and Zom B Gon to do the job right.
plot_en: An everyday American family discovers that they have a zombie infestation. Instead of trying to rid the creatures themselves, they call on Jackie Mannex and Zom B Gon to do the job right.
